what to add:

pathname (where the main/home html file will be located) --> LOCAL
htmlpath (where html files will be written and stored) --> VIRTUAL MACHINE
maskpath (path to mask mosaic) --> LOCAL
LSpath (path to LS mosaic) --> LOCAL
stamppath (path to LS optical cutouts) --> LOCAL
galhtmlpath (path to folder containing all galaxy html files, including main/home) --> LOCAL
mosaicpath (path to folder containing .png galfit mosaics) --> LOCAL

--will have to create mask mosaics
--need LS mosaics? 
--when creating wavelength band mosaics, be sure cutouts are same dimensions!

html_main (desired name of html main filename, append .html)
html_gal (desired name of html galaxy filename, append.html)

vf_sample (path to galaxy_subsample catalog)
vf_phot = (if applicable, path to galaxies with PA, B/A held fixed)
dummycat = (path to dummy_galaxy_catalog)
galfit_nopsf (path to table of galfit output parameters, run with psf not implemented)
galfit_psf (path to table of galfit output parameters, run with psf implemented)
galfit_fixed_psf (if applcable, path to table of galfit output parameters, run with psf implemented AND fixed PA, B/A)
PABA_comparison (some sort of flag indicating whether the website will incorporate PA, B/A parameters)



#--------------------------------------------------- File Names ----------------------------------------------------

vf_sample        /mnt/astrophysics/muchogalfit-input-cats/sgacut_coadd.fits   # VFS subsample
dummycat         /mnt/astrophysics/muchogalfit-input-cats/dummycat.fits       # off-centered galaxy catalog
directory        /mnt/astrophysics/wisesize/                                  # loc. of [insert band] images
gal_output_path  /mnt/astrophysics/kconger_wisesize/github/gal_output/        # where galfit output will go
vf_full          /mnt/astrophysics/muchogalfit-input-cats/vf_v2_main.fits     # vf main catalog (v2)

#--------------------------------------------------- Parameters ----------------------------------------------------

band               w3                                                         # wavelength band of image
organize           1                                                          # move output .fits to gal_output_path
convflag           0                                                          # 0 for conv, 1 for conv
test               True                                                       # in testing phase
